events.message: The customer reported a car collision that occurred on the morning of May 9th, requesting to file a claim immediately.
The claim has been categorised under Auto Accident due to the involvement of a vehicle and a collision incident.
An agent has been assigned to the case to assist the customer through the claim process following their car accident.
The insurance company acknowledged receipt of the vehicle accident claim and confirmed initiation of processing.
Customer was asked to submit police reports, photos of the accident, and vehicle repair estimates to continue with the claim.
All requested documents including insurance forms, police report, and vehicle damage images have been submitted by the customer.
The investigation team began reviewing submitted evidence and assessing the circumstances of the reported car accident.
Investigation concluded that the vehicle accident claim is valid and eligible for coverage under the customer's policy.
A settlement amount covering the vehicle repair costs and other related damages has been proposed to the insured.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the prompt handling and clear communication throughout the claim process.
The claim has been formally approved by the insurance adjuster, confirming coverage for all submitted vehicle damages.
Payment covering the agreed settlement amount was issued to the customer's designated bank account without delay.
The insurance claim was officially closed after successful settlement payment and confirmation from the insured.
All documents and records related to this auto accident claim have been archived for future reference and compliance.
